title: Dragon Ball Movie 2 – Sleeping Princess In Devil`s Castle
alternative_title: Dragon Ball Movie 2: Majinjou no Nemuri Hime, ドラゴンボール 魔神城のねむり姫
description: Goku and Kuririn are given an assignment by Kame-Sen'nin: "Retrieve the sleeping princess from Lucifer and I will take you as my students." But the mission proves to be more perilous than originally thought.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
